verses.text: \w And|strong="H4872"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* \w unto|strong="H1696"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w said|strong="H1696"\w* \w unto|strong="H1696"\w* \w them|strong="H6213"\w*, \w Hear|strong="H8085"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w statutes|strong="H2706"\w* \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w judgments|strong="H4941"\w* \w which|strong="H3478"\w* \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* ears \w this|strong="H6213"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w ye|strong="H3117"\w* \w may|strong="H3478"\w* \w learn|strong="H3925"\w* \w them|strong="H6213"\w*, \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w observe|strong="H8104"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w them|strong="H6213"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w made|strong="H3772"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* us \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w Horeb|strong="H2722"\w*.

(\w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* between \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w at|strong="H3068"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w time|strong="H6256"\w*, \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w shew|strong="H5046"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w ye|strong="H1697"\w* \w were|strong="H1697"\w* \w afraid|strong="H3372"\w* \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* fire, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w went|strong="H5927"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w into|strong="H5927"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w mount|strong="H2022"\w*;) \w saying|strong="H1697"\w*,

\w I|strong="H4714"\w* \w am|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w thy|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*, \w which|strong="H3068"\w* \w brought|strong="H3318"\w* thee \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* land \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w bondage|strong="H5650"\w*.
\w Thou|strong="H6440"\w* shalt \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w none|strong="H3808"\w* other gods \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w me|strong="H6440"\w*.

\w Thou|strong="H6213"\w* shalt \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w make|strong="H6213"\w* \w unto|strong="H6213"\w* \w thee|strong="H6213"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w graven|strong="H6459"\w* \w image|strong="H6459"\w*, \add the likeness of \add*\w any|strong="H3605"\w* \w form|strong="H8544"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w is|strong="H3605"\w* \w in|strong="H6213"\w* \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w* \w above|strong="H4605"\w*, \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w is|strong="H3605"\w* \w in|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w earth|strong="H8064"\w* \w beneath|strong="H8478"\w*, \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w is|strong="H3605"\w* \w in|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w* \w under|strong="H8478"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w earth|strong="H8064"\w*:

\w thou|strong="H3588"\w* shalt \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w bow|strong="H7812"\w* \w down|strong="H7812"\w* thyself \w unto|strong="H3068"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w serve|strong="H5647"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w*: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w thy|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w am|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w jealous|strong="H7067"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*, \w visiting|strong="H6485"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* fathers \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w third|strong="H8029"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w fourth|strong="H7256"\w* \w generation|strong="H8029"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w hate|strong="H8130"\w* \w me|strong="H8130"\w*;

\w and|strong="H2617"\w* \w shewing|strong="H6213"\w* \w mercy|strong="H2617"\w* \w unto|strong="H6213"\w* thousands, \w of|strong="H4687"\w* \w them|strong="H6213"\w* \w that|strong="H6213"\w* \w love|strong="H2617"\w* \w me|strong="H6213"\w* \w and|strong="H2617"\w* \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* \w my|strong="H8104"\w* \w commandments|strong="H4687"\w*.

\w Thou|strong="H3588"\w* shalt \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w take|strong="H5375"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w thy|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w vain|strong="H7723"\w*: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* hold \w him|strong="H5375"\w* \w guiltless|strong="H5352"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w taketh|strong="H5375"\w* \w his|strong="H5375"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w vain|strong="H7723"\w*.

\w Observe|strong="H8104"\w* \w the|strong="H8104"\w* \w sabbath|strong="H7676"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* \w it|strong="H6942"\w* \w holy|strong="H6942"\w*, \w as|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H8104"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w thy|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w thee|strong="H6680"\w*.

\w Six|strong="H8337"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* shalt \w thou|strong="H6213"\w* \w labour|strong="H5647"\w*, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w thy|strong="H6213"\w* \w work|strong="H4399"\w*:

\w but|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w seventh|strong="H7637"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w sabbath|strong="H7676"\w* \w unto|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w thy|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*: \add in it \add*\w thou|strong="H6213"\w* shalt \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w any|strong="H3605"\w* \w work|strong="H4399"\w*, \w thou|strong="H6213"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w thy|strong="H3068"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w thy|strong="H3068"\w* \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w thy|strong="H3068"\w* \w manservant|strong="H5650"\w* \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w thy|strong="H3068"\w* maidservant, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w thine|strong="H6213"\w* \w ox|strong="H7794"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w thine|strong="H6213"\w* \w ass|strong="H2543"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w any|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w thy|strong="H3068"\w* \w cattle|strong="H7794"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w thy|strong="H3068"\w* \w stranger|strong="H1616"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* within \w thy|strong="H3068"\w* \w gates|strong="H8179"\w*; \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w thy|strong="H3068"\w* \w manservant|strong="H5650"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w thy|strong="H3068"\w* maidservant \w may|strong="H3068"\w* \w rest|strong="H5117"\w* \w as|strong="H3117"\w* well \w as|strong="H3117"\w* \w thou|strong="H6213"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w thou|strong="H6213"\w* shalt \w remember|strong="H2142"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w thou|strong="H6213"\w* wast \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* land \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w thy|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w brought|strong="H3318"\w* \w thee|strong="H6213"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w thence|strong="H8033"\w* \w by|strong="H3027"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w mighty|strong="H2389"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w by|strong="H3027"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w stretched|strong="H5186"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w arm|strong="H2220"\w*: \w therefore|strong="H3651"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w thy|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w thee|strong="H6213"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w keep|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w sabbath|strong="H7676"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*.

\w Honour|strong="H3513"\w* \w thy|strong="H3068"\w* father \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w thy|strong="H3068"\w* mother, \w as|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w thy|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w thee|strong="H5414"\w*: \w that|strong="H3117"\w* \w thy|strong="H3068"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w may|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w long|strong="H3117"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w that|strong="H3117"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w* \w may|strong="H3068"\w* \w go|strong="H3190"\w* \w well|strong="H3190"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w thee|strong="H5414"\w*, \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* land \w which|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w thy|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w giveth|strong="H5414"\w* \w thee|strong="H5414"\w*.
Thou shalt do \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w murder|strong="H7523"\w*.
\w Neither|strong="H3808"\w* shalt thou \w commit|strong="H5003"\w* \w adultery|strong="H5003"\w*.
\w Neither|strong="H3808"\w* shalt thou \w steal|strong="H1589"\w*.
\w Neither|strong="H3808"\w* shalt thou \w bear|strong="H6030"\w* \w false|strong="H7723"\w* \w witness|strong="H5707"\w* \w against|strong="H7453"\w* thy \w neighbour|strong="H7453"\w*.

\w Neither|strong="H3808"\w* shalt thou \w covet|strong="H2530"\w* \w thy|strong="H2530"\w* \w neighbour|strong="H7453"\w*’s wife; \w neither|strong="H3808"\w* shalt thou \w desire|strong="H2530"\w* \w thy|strong="H2530"\w* \w neighbour|strong="H7453"\w*’s \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w field|strong="H7704"\w*, \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w manservant|strong="H5650"\w*, \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* maidservant, \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w ox|strong="H7794"\w*, \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w ass|strong="H2543"\w*, \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w any|strong="H3605"\w* \w thing|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w is|strong="H3605"\w* \w thy|strong="H2530"\w* \w neighbour|strong="H7453"\w*’s.

\w These|strong="H1696"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* \w unto|strong="H1696"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w assembly|strong="H6951"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w out|strong="H5414"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* fire, \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w cloud|strong="H6051"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w thick|strong="H6205"\w* \w darkness|strong="H6205"\w*, \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w voice|strong="H6963"\w*: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w added|strong="H3254"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w more|strong="H3254"\w*. \w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w wrote|strong="H3789"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w tables|strong="H3871"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* stone, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w unto|strong="H1696"\w* \w me|strong="H5414"\w*.

\w And|strong="H6963"\w* \w it|strong="H7126"\w* \w came|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w pass|strong="H1961"\w*, \w when|strong="H1961"\w* \w ye|strong="H7126"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* \w out|strong="H8432"\w* \w of|strong="H7626"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* \w of|strong="H7626"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w darkness|strong="H2822"\w*, \w while|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w mountain|strong="H2022"\w* \w did|strong="H2022"\w* \w burn|strong="H1197"\w* \w with|strong="H1197"\w* fire, \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w ye|strong="H7126"\w* \w came|strong="H1961"\w* \w near|strong="H7126"\w* \w unto|strong="H8085"\w* \w me|strong="H6963"\w*, even \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w heads|strong="H7218"\w* \w of|strong="H7626"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* \w tribes|strong="H7626"\w*, \w and|strong="H6963"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* \w elders|strong="H2205"\w*;

\w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w ye|strong="H3117"\w* \w said|strong="H1696"\w*, \w Behold|strong="H2005"\w*, \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w hath|strong="H3068"\w* \w shewed|strong="H7200"\w* \w us|strong="H7200"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w glory|strong="H3519"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w greatness|strong="H1433"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* \w out|strong="H7200"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* fire: \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w doth|strong="H3068"\w* \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w man|strong="H2088"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w liveth|strong="H2425"\w*.
